title: ResultSet
description: Represents a paginated set of results from an API query.

count.description: The total number of items matching the query.

total_pages.description: The total number of pages available for the query.

results.description: An array of result items. The actual schema of items depends on the context (e.g., Document, Agency).

errors.description: Optional: An object containing error details if the query resulted in errors.

description.description: Optional: A human-readable description of the result set.

previous_page_url.description: Optional: URL for the previous page of results.

next_page_url.description: Optional: URL for the next page of results.

Base.description: Placeholder for Base schema. All data models inherit from Base.
